SELECT /* WBLSurveyMapper.selectSurveyList */ a.cxstn_srv_seq ,b.year ,b.episd ,b.srv_seq ,a.part_cmpn_nm_1 ,a.part_cmpn_cd_1 ,a.part_cmpn_nm_2 ,a.part_cmpn_cd_2 ,a.ptcpt_cd ,a.ptcpt_cmpltn_dtm ,a.score ,a.reg_id ,(SELECT NAME FROM CO_ADM_MST WHERE ID = A.REG_ID) AS REG_NAME ,a.reg_ip ,a.reg_dtm ,a.mod_id ,(SELECT NAME FROM CO_ADM_MST WHERE ID = A.REG_ID) AS REG_NAME ,a.mod_ip ,a.mod_dtm FROM cx_appctn_rsume_srv_mst A left join cx_cmpn_episd_mst b on a.cxstn_cmpn_episd_seq = b.cxstn_cmpn_episd_seq
ORDER BY a.cxstn_srv_seq DESC LIMIT #{firstIndex}, #{recordCountPerPage}
SELECT /* WBLSurveyMapper.selectSurveyListCnt*/ COUNT(a.cxstn_srv_seq) FROM cx_appctn_rsume_srv_mst A left join cx_cmpn_episd_mst b on a.cxstn_cmpn_episd_seq = b.cxstn_cmpn_episd_seq

choose.when: AND ( INSTR(#{q}, A.REG_ID) > 0 OR EXISTS(SELECT 'x' FROM CO_ADM_MST WHERE ID = A.REG_ID AND INSTR(#{q}, NAME) > 0) )
AND ( INSTR(#{q}, MOD_ID) > 0 OR EXISTS(SELECT 'x' FROM CO_ADM_MST WHERE ID = A.MOD_ID AND INSTR(#{q}, NAME) > 0) )
choose.otherwise: AND ( INSTR(#{q}, a.part_cmpn_nm_1) > 0 OR INSTR(#{q}, a.part_cmpn_cd_1) > 0 OR INSTR(#{q}, a.part_cmpn_nm_2) > 0 OR INSTR(#{q}, a.part_cmpn_cd_2) > 0 OR EXISTS(SELECT 'x' FROM CO_ADM_MST WHERE ID = A.REG_ID AND INSTR(#{q}, NAME) > 0) OR INSTR(#{q}, a.MOD_ID) > 0 OR EXISTS(SELECT 'x' FROM CO_ADM_MST WHERE ID = A.MOD_ID AND INSTR(#{q}, NAME) > 0) )

mapper.select: select /* WBLSurveyMapper.selectSurveyDtl */ a.cxstn_srv_seq , a.cxstn_cmpn_episd_seq , b.year , b.episd , a.part_cmpn_nm_1 , a.part_cmpn_cd_1 , a.part_cmpn_nm_2 , a.part_cmpn_cd_2 , a.rprsnt_nm , a.bsnm_reg_no , a.pic_nm , a.tel_no , a.email , b.srv_seq , (select titl from sv_mst where srv_seq = b.srv_seq) as titl , a.srv_rspn_seq , a.crtfn_no , a.ptcpt_cd , a.cmpltn_yn , a.ptcpt_cmpltn_dtm , a.score , a.reg_id , a.reg_ip , a.reg_dtm , a.mod_id , a.mod_ip , a.mod_dtm from cx_appctn_rsume_srv_mst A left join cx_cmpn_episd_mst b on a.cxstn_cmpn_episd_seq = b.cxstn_cmpn_episd_seq where a.cxstn_srv_seq = #{detailsKey}

SELECT /* WBLSurveyMapper.selectEpisdListCnt*/ COUNT(a.cxstn_cmpn_episd_seq) FROM cx_cmpn_episd_mst a inner join sv_mst b on a.srv_seq = b.srv_seq
where a.cxstn_cmpn_episd_seq = #{cxstnCmpnEpisdSeq}
SELECT /* WBLSurveyMapper.selectEpisdMst */ cxstn_cmpn_episd_seq FROM cx_cmpn_episd_mst WHERE year=#{year} and episd = #{episd}

select /* WBLSurveyMapper.selectEpisdSurveyList */ a.cxstn_cmpn_episd_seq , a.year , a.episd , a.srv_seq , b.titl , (select count(cxstn_srv_seq) from cx_appctn_rsume_srv_mst where cxstn_cmpn_episd_seq = a.cxstn_cmpn_episd_seq and ifnull(srv_rspn_seq,0) > 0 ) as rspn_cnt from cx_cmpn_episd_mst a inner join sv_mst b on a.srv_seq = b.srv_seq order by a.year , a.episd asc
